Package game.dinosaur

Class Brachiosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaur.Brachiosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, DinosaurInterface, Herbivore
public class Brachiosaur
extends Actor
implements Herbivore
Child class of HerbivoreInterface A herbivourous dinosaur that eats fruits from trees
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Suchit Krishna

    • Brachiosaur

      public Brachiosaur​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.Boolean isBaby)
      Constructor. All Brachiosaurs are represented by a 'B' and have 160 hit points.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Brachiosaur
      gender - gender of the dinosaur
      isBaby - boolean representing where dinosaur is a baby

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed

    • breeding

      public Action breeding​(Location subject, GameMap map)
      This method is used to breed two dinosaurs of different genders
      Specified by:
      breeding in interface DinosaurInterface
      Parameters:
      subject - is the current location of the dinosaur
      Returns:
      the breedingaction/layeggaction or null if the dino is a baby or is unable to breed
      See Also:
      BreedingBehaviour
